name: Onion World
description:
Take an adventure in the Onion World! Explore the land while collecting items that you will need to continue your journey. Along the way, listen to what the townsfolk have to say, they may be able to help you out!

The controls are a bit unique.  The left and right arrow keys are used to walk left and right. The up arrow key is to go to a farther layer through doors and alleyways. The down arrow key is to go to a closer a layer as indicated by the yellow glow. Spacebar is to jump and shift is to pick up flower pots.
